item.title: PENGU Price Plunges 15% as Pudgy Penguins Insiders Offloads Another $5.6M
item.description:

item.title: Trump Report Calls for Clear Crypto Laws and SEC Rules for Digital Assets
item.description:
Trump advisers’ 166-page report on digital assets has recommended broad updates to U.S. crypto oversight—giving the CFTC spot-market authority, clarifying how banks can issue and custody stablecoins, refreshing tax and AML rules, and reinforcing a dollar-based regime while opposing a federal CBDC.

The post Trump Report Calls for Clear Crypto Laws and SEC Rules for Digital Assets appeared first on Cryptonews.
